entities.description: Indicates if the respondent had any past year use of Carisoprodol Products.
Indicates if the respondent had any past year use of muscle relaxants.
Indicates if the respondent had any past year use of prescription tranquilizers.
Indicates if the respondent had any past year use of Amphetamine or Methylphenidate Products.
Class of drugs used for the treatment of ADHD.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent had past year use of Carisoprodol Products.
Indicates whether the respondent had past year use of muscle relaxants containing carisoprodol.
Indicates whether the respondent had past year use of prescription tranquilizers.
Indicates whether the respondent had past year use of Amphetamine or Methylphenidate Products.
Amphetamines are used in the treatment of ADHD.
